name: Gravitational Gauntlets
data: It increases the users intelligence magnificently.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
It gives nice bonus to the skill 'spacial manipulation'.
This item loses its magical powers slowly.
The gauntlets convert gravitational force into magical energy.
The gauntlets' power increases in proportion to the wearer's burden.
